channel.title: News on Brian Jay Tang
channel.description: Recent content in News on Brian Jay Tang

item.title: ExtPrivA Paper Accepted
item.description: Our paper, Detection of Inconsistencies in Privacy Practices of Browser Extensions , got accepted at IEEE S&P 2022!

item.title: HRI Paper Accepted
item.description: Our paper, Confidant: A Privacy Controller for Social Robots , got accepted at HRI 2022!

item.title: PhD 1st Year Fellowship
item.description: I received the University of Michigan College of Engineering 1st Year PhD Fellowship!

item.title: PhD Start
item.description: I joined the Real-Time Computing Lab at the University of Michigan as a PhD student!

item.title: Graduated with B.S.
item.description: ðŸŽ“ I graduated with a B.S. in Computer Sciences at UW - Madison!

item.title: Face-Off Paper Accepted
item.description: Our paper, Face-Off: Adversarial Face Obfuscation , got accepted at PoPETS 2021!

item.title: Interned at Roblox
item.description: I started my software engineering internship at Roblox Corporation!

item.title: First paper written
item.description: I finished my first paper, Rearchitecting Classification Frameworks For Increased Robustness !

item.title: Research Start
item.description: I joined the Wisconsin Privacy and Security Group at the University of Wisconsin - Madison as an undergraduate student!
